attributes.action: up the rate of pay for young apprentices, in order to make them want to learn a trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think its highly unfair that i am 17 years old and only earning 50pounds per week(37 1/2 hours), if we complain there are not enough skilled workers in the uk, then try and make it a bit more tempting for younger people, the only reason we see people in dead end jobs, etc. is purely because there is no motivation to learn a trade, who can possibly survive on 50pounds per week, i know i cant!
